Description.Text: The apartments are situated inside the York City Walls just off the historic street off Micklegate and just a 2 minute walk to Skeldergate bridge with it's beautiful views of the River Ouse. Although very well located, the properties are situated down a quiet side street guaranteeing a good nights sleep. The apartments have large screen plasma televisions with full Sky HD package (including movies and sports), free wi-fi in all areas, dvd player with a selections of films and ipod docking station.

Deluxe Apartment - Deluxe Apartment with double or two twin beds includes direct lift access from the underground car park and features superb river views from the lounge floor to ceiling windows and balcony. The apartment has full kitchen facilities including dishwasher, full Sky package and free wi-fi in all areas. The apartment sleeps a maximum of 5 adults. A large 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment located on the 3rd floor.
